text: Station building Hatsuno Station's platform is a railway station located in Tomioka (富岡), Bifuka, Nakagawa District (Teshio), Hokkaidō, and is operated by the Hokkaido Railway Company. ==Lines serviced== *Hokkaido Railway Company **Sōya Main Line ==Adjacent stations== ==External links== *Ekikara Time Table - JR Hatsuno Station Category:Railway stations in Hokkaido Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1959
title: Hatsuno Station
